name: Vanessa Brown
text: This place is amazing! Friendly owners who are very knowledgeable and easy to talk to. Their dog is precious and loves to cuddle as well. The wine is delicious to say the least! The wine is $8 a bottle, but right now they have a buy 3 get 1 free special. Their jam is delicious and only $2.50 a jar. Simply put, I'll be a regular there! :)

name: Rachel Graham
text: A great treasure in Perry County!! We went in for a wine tasting and got so much more.  Tim and Vickey shared stories from their trip to the California wineries that began their interest as well as details about each of the wines we tasted and the process that goes into making them.  We tasted all the wines in stock and selected our favorites.  This is all logged on a card that they will pull for you when you come back.  The wines were very reasonably priced at $8.00 per bottle and if you buy 3 you get the fourth bottle FREE.  I also purchased a small jar of Muscadine Jelly and a wine glass with their logo.  My favorite wines were the Scuppuernong Semi Sweet, LCV Red and Black Spanish.  The wine is all labeled with Perry County, this makes for a nice memento for someone who has ties to Perry County or for the collector who likes wines from local vineyards.   Please go by and see Tim and Vickey, they have created a little slice of heaven for us wine lovers right in Perry County.

name: Sherry Joiner
text: My husband David came through the door this afternoon with a case of your wine. We opened a bottle and it was wonderful! We are giving out the wine for Mothers Day. Thank you for the glasses and I would like to buy a few of them also. I will send him back for them soon :)

name: Grace Ballard
text: Bought 2 bottles, one for myself and one as a birthday gift for my daughter in law. Great wine.  Different from what we would normally buy. A nice change.

name: Max Podium
text: Best wine I've ever tasted. Wish you guys were near Montgomery, this would be my weekly pick.

name: Sue Rhiney Nichols
text: We recently visited Log Cabin Vineyard and Winery for a wine tasting benefit. It was our first visit to LCV and we were pleasantly surprised to discover this hidden gem so close to home.  A short drive off the highway through a stand of pine trees, LCV offers a beautiful setting in rural Perry County in central Alabama (approximately 15 miles from Selma), complete with rocking chairs on a long covered porch overlooking the lush vineyard. The cozy tasting room was comfortable and inviting, with barstool seating and sofa/chair seating, and we enjoyed talking with owners Tim and Vickey Letson and learning about their operation. LCV is definitely worth a visit! We will be there again soon!

name: S. Foster
text: Absolutely amazing!

name: matthew basaraba
text: Wonderful experience at Harbor View Winery today. Come in empty handed because you will not leave that way! Enjoy some wine or moonshine tasting and talk with the owners, they are here to help. Would be wonderful if they offered food. Thank you for a fabulous time, we will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you so much. Can’t wait to see you next time

name: Kelsey H
text:
My  husband and I decided to head up to Guntersville for an anniversary afternoon trip.  We went to the antique shops and decided to end at the winery. He's the wine drinker so I was just along for for ride. We indulged in the wine taste tasting. Luckily, we happened upon a fruit winery so I was finally able to enjoy a tasting!
Greg was so entertaining and we had a wonderful time.  Very laid back atmosphere.  We're hoping that we can go back to do it all again with some of our friends. I highly recommend the blueberry and key lime.  He really liked the port blends; we went home with the blueberry port.
Even some flavors I would not normally like (orange coffee) were amazing.  We loved the stories and details that Greg added to the experience.
We will definitely be purchasing more fruit wines from them and it looks like everyone will be getting wine for Christmas!

resp.text: Hi Kelsey,  We appreciate your post and are so pleased that you enjoyed your wine tasting experience!  We hope to see you again soon!

name: Lisa Foster
text: This is our second stop in.  The first was a wine tasting, after an unfortunate cancellation of a wine tasting at the campground where we are seasonal campers.  We loved the wine tasting and enjoyed the slushes we had while there.  We came back for another tonight, and hope to make it a weekend habit!

resp.text: Hi Lisa,  We look forward to your weekend visits!!!

name: John loper
text: Such an interesting combination of wines from around the world, great tasting slushies, and fun people working, try everything!

resp.text: Thanks John. We had a great time can’t wait to see you guys again

name: Melissa Harty
text: My husband and I have done a lot of wine tasting in our day ;) but this was by far the most unique and enjoyable experience!   Keep an open mind and you will not be disappointed. Nothing pretentious here - just a laid back welcoming atmosphere!   We had so much fun sampling an incredible assortment of blends, slushies, and fruity wines; and left with 2 boxes.  I want to also add that it is a great place to buy gifts for friends and family with wonderful "party basket" ideas.  The hospitality from the workers and owners was phenomenal.

resp.text: Thank you so much for stopping by and checking out our little slice of Heaven. As y’all quickly discovered, we believe in our wines, having fun and making new friends! Y’all were so much fun and isn’t great discovering new things that you love?! We appreciate your support and wonderful review! We hope y’all will stop by again real soon!!!

name: Wayne Rhodes
text: We had a wonderful wine tasting at HarborView Winery. Greg was a wonderful sommelier.  Very knowledgeable.

resp.text: Thanks Wayne! You guys are great. Come back anytime it was a lot of fun.

name: Linda Muzquiz
text: What a great experience we had at Harbor View Winery!! The owners are so friendly, knowledgeable and genuinely excited about their wines!! My favorites were the grapefruit wine, the Bloody Mary Wine, the Blueberry semi sweet, and the Key Lime slushy was so delicious!!!  Their winery has a lovely view of Lake Guntersville and is sick a nice place to relax after indulging in their tasty wine! We’ll definitely be back!

resp.text: Linda, it was an honor to have you in today! We’re so happy you enjoyed hanging out with us and learning which wines you like. We look forward to seeing you again very soon!

name: Julia Blackburn
text: Sweet wines with friendly employees. They have smoothie mixes to pair with your wines (wine slushies!) and lots of fun wine themed items. Family owned small business vibe. We will be back again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for spending time with us! We love meeting new friends and telling our story. We hope to see you back soon.

name: Joshua Beitler
text: Really nice people, some really good wines and super delicious slushies!

resp.text: Thanks so much Josh. Hope to see you guys soon had a really good time with you guys.

name: Elizabeth Barnes
text: Friendly people,great prices will be going back

resp.text: So happy you enjoyed yourself come back soon we have some new ones coming in. Bring some friends

name: Stanley Rochelle
text: Great little shop,  and great samples

name: Tammy Basaraba
text: Great people and great wine!!

resp.text: We love our wines and meeting new friends!!! Thank you for stopping in to sample our wines and for spending a little time with us. Please come back to see us soon!

name: Sarah Skelton
text: This place is so adorable! 25$ for 10 wine tasting. Minority owned.  Owner told me only one of 10 minority owned wineries. Prior military owner. Outdoor seating. Friday night date nights. Unique made only there set tea wine and lemonade wine you xant get anywhere else.

name: Gregory Haney
text: Amazing owners/staff. Very knowledgeable and thorough on the process of making wine. Wonderful hospitality and the selection is phenomenal. The peach and sweet tea is remarkable. Definitely plan on going back for the date night special they have. If you are look for a great winery here you are. Thank you Daniel and Rita.

resp.text: Thank you, we look forward to seeing y'all soon! Daniel and Rita

name: Midys Rojas
text: We just visited Lake Point Vineyard and it was a great experience. Everyone was extremely nice. They treated us so well!  We felt welcomed and the entire experience was positive. The wine was very different but very good. Highly recommended!!!

name: Tori Toria
text: Great atmosphere with great service.  Overall it was a very pleasant experience. The peach wine was my favorite. It was a nice outing for my husband's birthday, he enjoyed it, so that's a plus. Will be returning!!!

name: A. M. D. Vaughan
text: Really nice couple owner/operators... Made my husband and I feel very comfortable 😊

resp.text: Thank you, so glad you and your husband enjoyed yourselves. See y'all soon.

name: S Mcdade
text: Every wine enthusiast needs to add this venue to their list of places to enjoy good wine! Lake Point Vineyard is a wonderful gem that is very close to Montgomery. The owners & staff have gone out of their way to share their passion for creating amazing fruit wines, as well as a relaxing atmosphere to just unwind! Great wine, beautiful scenery, & good friends makes this business a place to often revisit. I have only been there 3 times, but whose counting!😂

name: Jesse McClearia
text:
Everyone here is genuinely nice and helpful. They made sure my sister's birthday wine tasting was absolutely perfect. I've been to other wine tastings in Alabama and this one is the best!
There really isn't any wine I tried that I wouldn't reccomend.

name: Kaylen Thomas
text: I loved it here! The owners are so nice and we truly had a good time! The wine selections are AWESOME!

name: Rev. Jaye Lynn Peabody Smith
text: My husband and I visit wineries quite often. This one is the absolute best experience ever! The wine is  amazing. The experience is one of a kind. The customer service is top notch. You will not regret coming here!

name: N Lucy
text:
This was an AMAZING EXPERIENCE for me and my Sister.
The Customer Service was AS CLOSE TO PERFECT AS YOU CAN GET AND they have a score of 100 from the Health Department.
And
Yes The Wine Is Devine

name: Imahn Ralph
text: Today I had the pleasure of visiting the Lake Point Vineyard & Winery. The location is beautiful and the owners/staff are even better. I wasn't able to do the golf cart tour due to the rain, but we did do the shorter tour of the production area. Mr. Daniel and his wife Rita are sweet as pie and made my experience perfect. The selections of wines were unique and refreshing. They have wines for every palette and preference. My only desire would be a wine with a bubbles. Lol. I'll definitely be back. Be sure to try the sweet tea and honey wines!!

name: Donna Croft
text: The absolute best wine we've ever had!! The owners see to it that you have a wonderful experience there. This is a Not To Miss place!!!

name: Brenda Martin
text: We went to this winery for the first time today. What a wonderful little gem in Montgomery county! The owners/staff are knowledgeable and very friendly. We will go back here again and are looking forward to a date night here too. The fruit wines are delicious as well as the honey wine too.

name: jim patrick
text:
Our second time there, when we arrived the owners greeted us immediately told us to sit any where we wanted.  Also they allowed us to bring our dog out on the deck.

A few new wines from last time, all were good.  Next time we are in Montgomery plan on going back.

name: Amber Scott
text: Wonderful owners who were very informative. They provided tours of the grounds, and the wine making process. They use man different fruits grown on their property to make the wines. (Strawberry, blueberry, pear, peach, watermelon, muscadine, scupadine, BlackBerry, apple) We were able to taste several different wines, and recommendations were made based on our personal preferences. This is the ONLY winery in Montgomery County Alabama. Service was phenomenal. Can't wait to take more people!

name: Sandy Smith
text: The owners were lovely. The wine was great!  I attended the bridal shower of a dear friend. The chill fall night on the patio was everything!

name: kelli spann
text: Wonderful hosts. Relaxing atmosphere. Wine is delicious.  My favorite is the peach.

name: Dan Sifuentes
text: I had a great tasting and experience here. The owners and staff were super friendly. I highly recommend coming to this winery.

name: Maria Richardson
text: Everything was awesome.  Staff was amazing.

resp.text: Great! Thank you for visiting us.

name: Brenda Broderick
text: My husband and I went for our 11th wedding anniversary.  Great place and owners were really lovely people.  We will be back in the summer. Thank you for awesome wine and food!!!

resp.text: So happy y'all were able to come. Thank you, Daniel and Rita Lewis

name: takiki mcghee
text: Went to Lake Point Vineyard and Winery over the weekend for my niece birthday party and we had an amazing time. The owners, Daniel and Rita, were a joy to be around and extemely knowledgable about the wine business. We gave him a hard time about his College football choices, but other than that we had a wonderful time. Thanks and ROLL TIDE ROLL!

name: Milton Taylor
text: Very Nice and quiet place.....well enjoyed

name: Angie Salas
text: Great place for a good time with friends or a date. Awesome service and delicious wine!

name: Bernard Harris
text: Nice scenery nice peoples nice wines

name: Kenny Howard
text: Great place and really good wine! Can't wait to go back! The tour was cool, the facilities are really neat, and the owners are a lot fun! Try the sweat tea wine,  it's amazing. The peach wine is also fantastic, we didn't try a single thing that was even what you'd call average.

name: Hope Matthews
text: Amazing! Could sit on the patio for hours sipping some amazing wine a enjoying the view💜

name: Bougie Auntee
text: My daughter took me her one rainy Saturday afternoon. The place is just lovely, comfortable and cozy. The owner and staff made us feel comfortable. Great conversation. We got a tour of the winery, and outside. She explained future endeavors they have planned. Now, the 🍷, we got to taste several different flavors of the wine. . All were good. I was excited for the next one to be poured. Fantastic. Date night or with your girls, or you just want to chill. Lake Point is the place. You will not be disappointed. Thanks

name: Benjamin Baxter
text: Great experience...I loved it

name: Xiomara Espinosa
text: Daniel and Rita are the owners, and extremely welcoming. My boyfriend and I went to check it out on a drive home and had a great time. At first you turn into a neighborhood and I thought we were lost, but keep going! It's at the end of the street. It's worth it. Great environment, got a tour and learned how the process is done. We will definitely be back.

name: Yvette Young
text: Everything was so nice. The employees were so nice.

name: Jeri Moon
text:
The Ladies Of Essence Civic Organization experienced a Beautiful, very Pleasant time at Lake Pointe Vineyards & Winery .
We thoroughly enjoyed the Atmosphere,  the WINE and the Hospitality . Saturday afternoon,  August 24, 2019.
A nice place to " UNwind and WINE"

resp.text: Thank you so much,  we are glad you enjoyed your visit with us.

name: Tura Bibb-Stinson
text: Awesome place! Fabulous couple! We really enjoyed our visit/tasting. I literally liked each and every one of their wines. Do yourself a favor  and go for a tasting on Saturdays and Sundays 12-5. You will enjoy yourself and you'll buy some wine.

name: Jeff B
text: Something for everyone's taste here! The tasting is extremely well done by a friendly and courteous staff; the atmosphere is very relaxing.

name: Mike Anson
text: What a wonderful experience.  Daniel and Rita are awesome host.  Very friendly.  The wines they offer are very good.  Anyone looking for a nice outing on a Saturday or Sunday.  Well worth your drive.  You will not be disappointed I promise you.  5 stars all the way.  Wine and hosts.

name: Monique Simpson
text: This family owned business by Rita and Daniel was beautiful. The tour of the facility was great and explanation of detail was very intriguing. This was my first winery experience and it was fabulous. All the wine was delicious. I am normally not a sweet wine drinker, but purchased some sweet wines.  It was neat to taste so many of my favorite fruits, in wine! It was a nice morning getaway with my girl friends but can see it being a romantic place to go with my husband. Alot of effort and hard work was put into this profession business to make it comfortable for the customers. I definitely will be visiting again!

name: Valerie Powell
text: My husband and I stopped on our way back to Birmingham and honestly didn’t know what to expect. We were so pleasantly surprised and really enjoyed each wine we tasted. They gave us a full tour of the property and explained much of their process and how they got into the wine business. Very hospitable, patient, and you can tell they care about what they do and serving others. Snacks and water was provided and we left with two bottles we can’t wait to enjoy together this summer. We will definitely be back!

name: Secily Anson
text: Owners were WONDERFUL. The wine was even better! They gave us a tour of how they make their wine which was very neat and were generous on the wine tasting. I would highly recommend if you are in the area!

name: e hen
text: Great wine! Great atmosphere! Great service! Great people!

name: Jeremy Lee
text: The owners of this venue are genuine, welcoming  and very friendly, this is definitely an amazing attribute to add to Montgomery! They have a great selection of organic wines (roughly 14 different varieties)They have great customer service as well! This is definitely a hidden gem but I'm sure it will not be for long!

name: K PA
text: Amazing wine!!! Perfect environment  and the owners were wonderful!!!!

name: MARILYN foster
text: This is My first time going, I really enjoyed it. It is very interesting to taste different kind of wine that was homemade on Lake Point Vintage. I rate them a 10.

name: Brad A
text: Fantastic place to spend an afternoon on the weekend. Bring your family and friends and enjoy the great variety of fruit wines with the most vibrant and polite hosts!

name: Mike Coon
text: A nice find out in country and close enough to visit more often. Daniel and Rita are welcoming and a lot of fun.

name: Rita Pearson-Daley
text: Beautiful location! I went to the grand opening and got a tour of the place. All the fruit is grown on the property and the owners are so kind. We sampled 6 bottles and enjoyed our time immensly!

name: Steve E
text: The wine is very good, the owners are even better. Really nice people who love making wine.

name: Larry Batts
text: A very enjoyable stop. A good variety of delicious wine mingled with friendly conversation with the owners.

name: Porsha Steele
text: Very good wine. Would highly recommend....

name: Ralph Stinson
text: Very nice place, the Owners are very nice, me and my wife really enjoyed ourselves.

name: Frederick Kennedy
text: Good atmosphere. Great wine🍾🍾🍾

name: Suzy mae
text: Amazing, amazing, amazing.

name: Bambi Darnell
text: All the wines were delicious! The owner was so friendly . The vineyard was gorgeous .

name: Dakota Crook
text: Phenomenal selection of high quality muscadine, scuppernong, blueberry, peach, blackberry, & grapes.

name: Critter Bandersnatch
text: Nice people and excellent wine.

name: jeremysbrawley
text: Nice place

name: arron clinton
text: Yes they are nice like most vineyards are... There parking is like there wine. Very few! The tasting are $5 but if you buy a bottle it comes off that price. The vineyard is hard to see from the road. If not carefull you will pass it.

name: Stephen McGatha
text: Some of the best wines in the area. Highly recommend.

name: Christina Tate
text: Went to visit with some friends. Great customer service and the wines were wonderful. Cant wait to go back to enjoy a bottle while sitting outside to look at the beautiful scenery.

name: Cameron Czerwonka
text: Called ahead to confirm hours and arrived during advertised and confirmed hours (Close at 5 pm) and the Tasting Room was closed. Called again, but no answer or response. Very frustrating as White Oak is part of a six stop wine trail that we drove over 7 hours to tour. Only stamp we missed on the day

resp.text: Cameron we apologize for this. The winery lost power late saturday. Despite no lights, ac, or credit card processing, I kept the tasting room open till a few minutes before 5.  If you will text me at 2564533607 I will make an appt. for you at your convenience.

name: Kathy Hall
text: Just bought second bottle of red Muscadine this is awful! No more.

name: Rhonda Gilliard
text: Service was wonderful and that sparkling wine, best you never had!!!

name: Sandra Auffant
text: Very nice wine samples on weekend

name: Soon Whittier
text:
Love the wine, having a great conersation with owner with awesome view.
Great way to relax and spend Saturday afternoon.

name: Athol Cochrane
text: Great local wines, with a local flair from vine to bottle, handcrafted by knowledgeable, caring & friendly owners. Well worth a visit if your travels bring you to Jemison AL.

name: Robyn Wagner
text: Lovely quaint winery with the nicest owner and some fun muscadine wines!

name: Sexy Panda
text: Its gorgeous

name: April TheyCallMeVarmit
text: Just bought some Smith Ridge Red from the ABC store, wanting to use it for a dinner. This was the first time I bought Hidden Meadow Vineyard and I don't know if it was a bad bottle or what, but this wine was undrinkable. The smell was very strong, almost chemical-like. One person said it smells like Vicks 666, and another said it smells like "feet with long toenails". Either way I could not find anyone to take it. The taste was a bit metallic and extremely "off". I'm thinking it was a bad batch perhaps, but this was my first time trying this wine so I am unsure. I'm sorry for the negative review, but...I've had gas station wine and it was more palatable than this bottle.

resp.text: We are so sorry bout the wine!! If you don’t mind, which abc store did you purchase it from? There are some stores we don’t service any more. We will be glad to to replace the bottle if you would like to come to the tasting room, we will take care of you! Unfortunately our state laws don’t permit us to ship within the state. Feel free to call me anytime at 205-389-2389, would like to hear from you!

name: Tim Lee
text: The staff was very friendly, professional, and fun to be with. They made us feel "right at home" and the wine selection was outstanding! Two thumbs up!!!

name: Lisa Shows
text: Went there for a tasting. The wine was very good and the owners were very nice. The atmosphere felt like home. I definitely will be going back!

name: Douglas Rush
text: I tasted this wine at a restaurant in Clanton and went to the winery.  Tasted several and all were excellent.  The owners are very nice and helpful and will answer any questions.  I will definitely be going back.

name: Danielle Ambrose
text: Very beautiful and peaceful place. The owner and his son were very knowledgeable about the wine and did a great job explaining the process of how they make their wines. They had a great variety of delicious wine ranging from dry to sweet. They do have more sweet wines than dry but didn't taste anything I didn't like. The have a beautiful outdoor seating area overlooking the vineyard during the warm months. I would definitely recommend stopping by!

name: Wayne Sparks
text: Very nice and friendly people

name: Marie Popov
text: Excellent wines, peaceful and beautiful location and great people/owners!

name: Steve E
text: This is the best winery my wife and I have found in Alabama. Nice quite place with great service and great people. This has become a regular stop for us on weekends to stock up for a week or two. We highly recommend you visit them too.

name: Matt Bein
text: One of the best of not the best vineyards in Alabama! Such a secluded area and peaceful hills of vines. Very romantic scenery. A must stop place! I recommend the Cynthiana sweet and the peach!

name: Heather “Feather” Sellers
text: Lovely lovely surprise! We happened across this vineyard on a roadtrip.SO GLAD we did.The owner, Bill and his family were incredibly gracious and humble.The tasting was a story of Jemison and its people, each pour richer than the previous .The buildings were beautiful, wooden, with details that only come with passion for their winemaking.If you are anywhere near this vineyard, go! You will be surprised and delighted.

name: Mrs. DeJesus
text: I enjoyed it!! We visited Hidden Meadow October 2015. It wasn't very crowded and we were still able to do the tour and taste off the vine.

name: Ashley Lancaster
text: My husband had purchased a bottle of smith ridge red at the local abc store and was really looking forward to drinking it and the smell was awful and the taste was even worse we had 6 family members who had tasted this wine and all had the same reaction it was the nastiest thing we all have ever tasted will not recommend this to anyone very disappointed.

resp.text: We are very sorry about that! The SRR is one of our better sellers. I am glad to replace it or give you a refund. We are open on Friday and Saturday from 10-5.

name: Joshua Northcutt
text: My wife and I visited during the humane society fund raiser and had the time of our lives,the wine is amazing,the owners are so gracious and the place itself is so beautiful !    (Polar Bear & Little Mama)

resp.text: Thanks for coming out we are glad y'all had a wonderful time!!

name: Sissy Ellsworth
text: Enjoyed our visit with the owners Bill and Janette very much!! Great selection of wines and atmosphere! Definitely will visit again soon!

resp.text: Thank you!! We look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Jonathan Hill
text: Very nice family owned fantastic wine

name: Courtland Colburn
text: Great way to spend an afternoon.
